alert.note: Alert for Darke; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 6:03PM EDT until July 02 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PREBLE AND SOUTHERN DARKE COUNTIES... At 603 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Greenville to near Lewisburg, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Greenville, Arcanum, Bradford, Lewisburg, New Madison, Webster, Wayne Lakes, Gettysburg, Eldorado, Verona, West Manchester, Pitsburg, Gordon, Ithaca, Castine, Union Corners, Interstate 70 at US Route 127, Abbottsville, Horatio and Pikeville. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 6 and 17. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
